GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics which can be sorted by title, topic, author, body, created_at or comment count, either in ascending or descending order, and can be filtered by the topics mitch, paper or cats

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves up an object containing the details of the article requested by the user

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves up an object containing the details of the updated article following a request for an amendment to the number of votes for the article by the user

updatedArticle.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
updatedArticle.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: serves up an array of all usernames

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves up an array of comments relating to the article id specified by the user

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves up an object containing the details of the comment that the user posts to the specified article id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: serves up an empty object confirming that the comment input by the user has been deleted and the content is no longer available

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves up an object containing the details of the user relating to the username that the client provides in the request
